name: HENTAI PUZZLE
description: **NEW UPDATE** We recommend uninstalling pants before playing. Uncensored fun! Enjoy the story, solving puzzles you complete the pictures & get Steam achievements. if enjoy please give a positive review, we need them for steam to allow trading cards, badges, emoticons and wallpapers.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 or later Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible video card 512MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 650 MB available space
